books.title: Harry Potter
books.author: J.K Rowling
books.description: A fictional book about the child hero and magician Harry Potter.

books.title: Treasure Island
books.author: Robert Louis Stevenson
books.description: Tells a story of "buccaneers and buried gold". It is considered a coming-of-age story and is noted for its atmosphere, characters, and action.

books.title: To Kill a Mockingbird
books.author: Harper Lee
books.description: A novel set in the American South during the 1930s, dealing with the issues of race and class.

books.author: George Orwell
books.description: A novel depicting a totalitarian future society controlled by a single party and an omnipresent surveillance state.

books.title: Pride and Prejudice
books.author: Jane Austen
books.description: A classic romantic novel that explores themes of social standing, marriage, and love.
